channel.title: Where Should I Start To Begin?
channel.description: Hii i wanna make a runescape private server but. i dont know where to start. should i need a based client+source or Blank. plz help me where i need to start making a Runescape Private Server. Thanks Already :D

item.title: Where Should I Start To Begin?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

For future reference, try to only post in this section when you’ve encountered a specific problem regarding your server. For issues such as this there are tutorials and walkthroughs available across the internet.
Otherwise, good luck with your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Where Should I Start To Begin?

item.title: Where Should I Start To Begin?
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.source: Where Should I Start To Begin?

item.title: Where Should I Start To Begin?
item.dc:creator: @Lisanna Lisanna
item.description:
@Lisanna wrote:

[quote=“twins, post:2, topic:534488”]Go to the download section and pick a source that looks for you fun to start with (it usually comes with a download link for a client also).

After you have the source and the client, go to tutorials, read some… understand how to portforward, how to set no-ip, how to run server.

and Sheeebanggg you got a server running online, now to continue to administrate the server you will need to learn some java and read more tutorials in the tutorials section of this forums.[/quote]
Thank You <3

Read full topic
item.source: Where Should I Start To Begin?

item.title: Where Should I Start To Begin?
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

Go to the download section and pick a source that looks for you fun to start with (it usually comes with a download link for a client also).

After you have the source and the client, go to tutorials, read some… understand how to portforward, how to set no-ip, how to run server.

and Sheeebanggg you got a server running online, now to continue to administrate the server you will need to learn some java and read more tutorials in the tutorials section of this forums.

Read full topic
